DOC.brief_title: Controlled Acute Hypoxia Study - Abbreviated Sensor Line
DOC.detailed_description: The general procedure invasive control hypoxia clinical study directly compare test pulse oximeter measurement saturation measurement make multi-wavelength CO-oximeter take arterial blood sample healthy human subject . Following arterial cannulation , hypoxia induce reduce percent inspire oxygen subject breathe simultaneous measurement record test pulse oximeter arterial blood sample target level saturation .
DOC.criteria: Male female race 1850 year old , inclusive Females : negative urine pregnancy test day study participation ( prior exposure hypoxia ) Completed within last year : physical exam license physician , physician assistant ( PA ) , advanced practice nurse ; include 12 lead ECG , medical history , blood test ( complete blood count sickle cell trait/disease screen ) Meets specific demographic requirement monitor device study Willing able provide write informed consent Able participate duration evaluation Under 18 year 50 year age Pregnant and/or lactate woman Hypertension : three consecutive reading , systolic pressure great 145 mm Hg diastolic pressure great 90 mm Hg Premature ventricular contraction ( PVCs ) symptomatic occur rate four per minute History seizure ( except childhood febrile seizure ) epilepsy History unexplained syncope Daily frequent use anxiolytic drug ( benzodiazepine ) treatment anxiety disorder Recent history frequent migraine headache : average two per month last year Compromised circulation , injury , physical malformation finger , toe , hand , ear forehead/skull sensor site would limit ability test site need study . ( Note : Certain malformation may still allow subject participate condition note would affect particular site utilized . ) History acute altitude sickness moderate elevation ( 5,00010,000 foot ) define three follow symptom : moderate severe headache , general malaise , dizziness/lightheadedness , nausea/vomiting , fatigue/weakness , shortness breath , nosebleed , persistent rapid pulse , peripheral edema History significant respiratory disease severe asthma emphysema Sickle cell disease trait Clinically significant abnormal find medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test ECG . Clinical significance assess principal investigator study physician designate . History stroke , transient ischemic attack carotid artery disease History myocardial ischemia , angina , myocardial infarction , congestive heart failure cardiomyopathy History chronic renal impairment Severe contact allergy standard adhesive , latex material find pulse oximetry sensor , ECG electrodes , respiration monitor electrodes medical sensor Unwillingness inability remove color nail polish test digit ( ) Unwillingness inability give inform consent Prior know allergy : lidocaine ( similar pharmacological agent , e.g. , Novocain ) heparin Recent arterial cannulation ( i.e. , less 30 day prior study date ) Six arterial cannulation ( right & leave ) radial artery History clinically significant complication previous arterial cannulation Current use blood thinner : prescription daily aspirin use
